terms_and_conditions: By checking this box, I confirm that I have read and agree to the <0>Terms of service</0>.

warning.unload_page: The transaction is still pending. Please do not leave the page or close the browser window.

error.metamask_not_found: Missing metamask plugin - get it from
error.approval_failed: Setting allowance permission in wallet app failed. Reason: {{error}}
error.allowance_revoke_notice: Due to the failed transaction, there might be a pending allowance on your wallet. For more information on this, please have a look

field.walletType: This field must contain a wallet address (0x...)
field.numberType: This field must contain an integer number
field.amountType: This field must contain an amount (e.g. 1234.31)
field.minLength: This field must be at least {{minLength}} characters
field.maxLength: This field must be at most {{maxLength}} characters
field.min: This field must be at least {{minValue}}
field.max: This field must be at most {{maxValue}}
field.minmax: The minimum value must be smaller than the maximum value

help.faucet: Click this link to receive some {{currency}} from the faucet

coins_sent: Some coins have been sent to your wallet for testing purposes
wait_for_coins: Please wait for the coins to be sent to your wallet. This might take some seconds. Do not leave the page of close the browser window
unclaimed_reward_tooltip: All unclaimed DIP rewards that have accumulated for stakes on this risk bundle since staking started or the last claim.

alert.unstaking_multiple_nfts: Your stakes are distributed over multiple NFTs. Unstaking must be done in multiple transactions - each being limited to the staked amount on this NFT.
alert.no_wallet_connected: Please connect a wallet to view your stakes and bundles
alert.no_bundles_to_stake: There are no bundles available to stake
